title: Apprentice's Scarf
summaries: The Apprentice's Scarf is an accessory that increases the player's maximum number of sentries by one and increases summon damage by 10%. It is dropped by the Dark Mage with a 25*1/4 (25%) / 50*1/2 (50%) chance.

statistics.Tooltip:
Increase your max number of sentries by 1
Increases summon damage by 10%
statistics.Sell: 3
